results.firPara: The Galaxy and Sounders face each other for the first of three games in three weeks; Adrian Heath out at Orlando; Tim Howard looks for more clean sheets
results.secPara: We hope that Clint Dempsey and Gyasi Zardes got along during Copa America, because this month theyre about to see a lot more of each other. Saturdays match between LA Galaxy and the Seattle Sounders will launch the first of three fixtures in the span of three weeks and if both players are not best friends by the end of the summer, Ill officially retire from this weekly preview. (Kidding! I like my job.)
results.webTitle: Familiarity beckons for LA and Seattle, and Orlando need a new head coach

results.firPara: The English Football League has made radical changes to what used to be the Johnstones Paint Trophy, but some of the Premier League clubs invited to enter academy sides are pulling out and not all fans are impressed either
results.secPara: The English Football League has made radical changes to what used to be the Johnstones Paint Trophy, but some of the Premier League clubs invited to enter academy sides are pulling out and not all fans are impressed either
results.webTitle: New EFL Trophy sparks withdrawals, anger and apathy before a ball is kicked

results.firPara: Got a minute? Digest the best of our latest coverage from Euro 2016 as hosts France set up a final against Portugal in Paris on Sunday
results.webTitle: The Euro 2016 minute: and then there were two

results.firPara: Love him or – as most seem to – loathe him, the Portugal primadonnas claims to being the greatest player of his generation will be enhanced only if he leads them to unlikely Euro 2016 glory in Sundays final with France
results.secPara: Love him or – as most seem to – loathe him, the Portugal primadonnas claims to being the greatest player of his generation will be enhanced only if he leads them to unlikely Euro 2016 glory in Sundays final with France
results.webTitle: Cristiano Ronaldo is like The Revenant: self-belief that just won’t die | Rob Smyth

results.firPara: Nicola Rizzolis penalty decision in the Euro 2016 semi-final between Germany and France shows the need for a rule tweak to clarify that handball is about body-shape and control as well as intent
results.secPara: Nicola Rizzolis penalty decision in the Euro 2016 semi-final between Germany and France shows the need for a rule tweak to clarify that handball is about body-shape and control as well as intent
results.webTitle: Bastian Schweinsteiger and the great handball dilemma: was it intentional?

results.firPara: A number of Premier League clubs have decided to opt out of entering their academy sides into the revamped English Football League Trophy.
results.secPara: The 15 Premier League clubs with category one academies and Newcastle United, as the next highest placed finisher with a first rate underage structure, had been invited to join the 48 clubs from League One and League Two in an attempt to spruce up the competition – formerly known as the Johnstones Paint Trophy – starting this season.
results.webTitle: Premier League clubs to opt out of revamped EFL Trophy

results.firPara: From the heartbreak of Pasadena to outright hilarity at White Hart Lane, penalties can make fools of us all. Here are some of the most foolish
results.secPara: Everyone has different penalty customs. In the Joy of Sixs primary school, the defending side would stand behind the goalline to chorus naked women, naked women even though no one had the slightest notion of why that image might be distracting. But its the thought that counts, and when it comes to potential embarrassment of an opponent, anythings worth trying, because actual embarrassment of an opponent is hilarious.
results.webTitle: The Joy of Six: terrible football penalties

results.firPara: Marcelo Bielsa has resigned as manager of Lazio after just two days in the job, the Serie A club have confirmed.
results.secPara: The 60-year-old was officially due to start in his new post on Saturday having been appointed as Stefano Piolis replacement at the Stadio Olimpico on Wednesday. However Bielsa has had a change of heart, living up to his reputation for eccentric behaviour in the process. He walked out on Marseille after just one match of the last Ligue 1 season.
results.webTitle: Marcelo Bielsa resigns as Lazio manager after just two days in the job

results.firPara: The Wales football team will be given a heroes welcome when they arrive back from France. If youre joining in the celebrations, share your photos and videos
results.secPara: The Wales football team will be given a heroes welcome when they arrive back from France. If youre joining in the celebrations, share your photos and videos
results.webTitle: Euro 2016: share your photos from Wales' homecoming party

results.firPara: Mark Clattenburg has been chosen to referee Sundays Euro 2016 final between Portugal and France, completing a unique treble of showpiece fixtures in one season.
results.secPara: The 41-year-old also refereed Mays Champions League final between Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid in Milan and Manchester Uniteds FA Cup win over Crystal Palace at Wembley a week earlier.
results.webTitle: Mark Clattenburg to referee Euro 2016 final between Portugal and France
